page.title: 08St.Combs Gala
page.content: {St.Combs Gala}is a fairly recent event, the first one was held in{1975, which takes place every year in the month of{June.}The idea behind the {Gala}was to raise funds for two changing rooms with showers to replace an old nissen hut.It lasted{two days and made a profit of Â£700.Because of the success they decided to make it an annual event and instead of two changing rooms they were able to get a hall,showers etc..The total cost was {Â£63,000}the playing commitee having to find{25%}of this,the rest being met by outside grants.The{Gala}itself is a great success covering a radius of about twenty miles,entrants from such places as{Crimond,Fraserburgh etc.. Activities include{football,netball, {tug o war,discos,fancy dress and some {stalls.}A great week is had by all..
